def describe(self): """ Gets metadata about a state machine.
:return: The metadata about the state machine. """ if self.state_machine_arn is None: raise ValueError try: response = self.stepfunctions_client.describe_state_machine( stateMachineArn=self.state_machine_arn) logger.info("Got metadata for state machine %s.", self.state_machine_name) except ClientError: logger.exception( "Couldn't get metadata for state machine %s.", self.state_machine_name) raise else: return response
